title: Live briefing: U.S. deadline looms for Israel to improve Gaza’s access to aid
content: The Saudi crown prince called Israel’s conduct “genocide.” U.S. officials warned of potential military aid suspension if Israel did not improve Gaza’s aid situation.
summary: The Saudi crown prince called Israel’s conduct “genocide.” U.S. officials warned of potential military aid suspension if Israel did not improve Gaza’s aid situation.

title: U.S. deadline for Israel improve aid access into Gaza set to expire
With new stealth fighter, China displays ambitions to challenge U.S.
content: China debuted the J-35A jet at an airshow that was attended by a senior Russian national security official, underlining Beijing’s ever-closer bonds with Moscow.
summary: China debuted the J-35A jet at an airshow that was attended by a senior Russian national security official, underlining Beijing’s ever-closer bonds with Moscow.

title: New Zealand government apologizes for ‘horrific’ abuse in state care
content: Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said sorry to some 200,000 survivors of physical and sexual abuse in institutions, which an inquiry called a “national disgrace.”
summary: Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said sorry to some 200,000 survivors of physical and sexual abuse in institutions, which an inquiry called a “national disgrace.”

title: With Trump win, Israeli minister calls to annex parts of West Bank
Gunfire closes Haiti’s main airport as new prime minister is sworn in
content: A council tasked with restoring order to the nation said it was replacing Prime Minister Garry Conille with businessman Alix Didier Fils-Aimé.
summary: A council tasked with restoring order to the nation said it was replacing Prime Minister Garry Conille with businessman Alix Didier Fils-Aimé.

title: Trump is planning a border crackdown. Biden already started one.
content: Donald Trump has pledged to quickly subdue migrant crossings at the southern border by restoring the policies of his first term, including “Remain in Mexico.”
summary: Donald Trump has pledged to quickly subdue migrant crossings at the southern border by restoring the policies of his first term, including “Remain in Mexico.”

title: What Trump's win means for the rest of the world
content: On today’s “Post Reports,” how foreign leaders are reacting to Trump’s victory, and how they are preparing for a second Trump presidency.
summary: On today’s “Post Reports,” how foreign leaders are reacting to Trump’s victory, and how they are preparing for a second Trump presidency.

title: With Trump win, Israeli minister calls to annex parts of West Bank
content: Comments Monday by Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich were the strongest display yet of how Trump’s election has emboldened Israeli hard-liners.
summary: Comments Monday by Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich were the strongest display yet of how Trump’s election has emboldened Israeli hard-liners.

title: Majority of Gaza aid missions in October were denied or impeded by Israel, U.N. says
Trump win means ‘time has come’ to annex parts of West Bank, Israeli minister says
content: Israel’s fight against Hamas in Gaza and Hezbollah in Lebanon is set to dominate the agenda at gatherings in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and the White House this week.
summary: Israel’s fight against Hamas in Gaza and Hezbollah in Lebanon is set to dominate the agenda at gatherings in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and the White House this week.

title: Israeli minister says ‘time has come’ to annex parts of West Bank
Trump talked to Putin, told Russian leader not to escalate in Ukraine
content: President-elect Donald Trump spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday and discussed the war in Ukraine, according to people familiar with the call.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday and discussed the war in Ukraine, according to people familiar with the call.

title: In Amsterdam, a murder victim’s hologram asks for help solving her case
content: Dutch police made a hologram of Bernadett Szabó, a sex worker found dead in 2009 in Amsterdam’s red-light district, to appeal for help in solving her murder.
summary: Dutch police made a hologram of Bernadett Szabó, a sex worker found dead in 2009 in Amsterdam’s red-light district, to appeal for help in solving her murder.

title: WHO: Health care in Gaza in ‘apocalyptic’ state, Lebanese centers forced to close
Kremlin spokesman claims Putin-Trump call did not occur
content: The Washington Post reported that the two men spoke on Thursday, with President-elect Donald Trump joining the call from his resort in Florida.
summary: The Washington Post reported that the two men spoke on Thursday, with President-elect Donald Trump joining the call from his resort in Florida.

title: Arab and Muslim leaders gather in Saudi Arabia for summit on Gaza war
20 children killed in Israeli strikes in Gaza and Lebanon, officials say
20 children killed in Israeli strikes in Gaza and Lebanon, officials say
content: The deadly attacks came as Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Sunday he has spoken with President-elect Donald Trump three times in recent days.
summary: The deadly attacks came as Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Sunday he has spoken with President-elect Donald Trump three times in recent days.

title: Dozens killed in strikes in Gaza and Lebanon, officials say
content: Strikes in northern Gaza and across Lebanon killed at least 20 children, officials said, highlighting the toll of Israel’s war against militant groups on local populations.
summary: Strikes in northern Gaza and across Lebanon killed at least 20 children, officials said, highlighting the toll of Israel’s war against militant groups on local populations.

title: Israeli strikes in Lebanon kill at least 7 children and 10 paramedics, among others
Ukraine launches biggest drone attack yet on Moscow
content: Russia’s Defense Ministry said its air defense systems intercepted 70 Ukrainian drones over six regions, including 34 over the Moscow region.
summary: Russia’s Defense Ministry said its air defense systems intercepted 70 Ukrainian drones over six regions, including 34 over the Moscow region.
